TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit Cursor extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public NotInheritable Class Cursor Implements IDisposable, ISerializable
public ref class Cursor sealed : IDisposable, System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializable

summary.span: 代表用于绘制鼠标指针的图像。

span.span: Represents the image used to paint the mouse pointer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 游标是由诸如鼠标、 钢笔或轨迹球的指点设备控制其位置在屏幕上的小图片。A cursor is a small picture whose location on the screen is controlled by a pointing device, such as a mouse, pen, or trackball. 当用户将指针设备时，操作系统将相应移动光标。When the user moves the pointing device, the operating system moves the cursor accordingly. 不同的游标形状用于通知用户鼠标将有什么操作。Different cursor shapes are used to inform the user what operation the mouse will have. 例如，当编辑或选择文本，光标，通常会显示。For example, when editing or selecting text, a cursor is typically displayed. 等待光标通常用于通知用户进程当前正在运行。A wait cursor is commonly used to inform the user that a process is currently running. 你可能必须等待用户的进程的示例要打开的文件，保存文件，或如填充控件，或有大量的数据。Examples of processes you might have the user wait for are opening a file, saving a file, or filling a control such as a , or with a large amount of data. 派生自的所有控件类具有属性。All controls that derive from the class have a property. 若要更改它的控件的边界内时，鼠标指针所显示的光标，分配到的控件属性。To change the cursor displayed by the mouse pointer when it is within the bounds of the control, assign a to the property of the control. 或者，通过分配，在应用程序级别显示游标到属性。Alternatively, you can display cursors at the application level by assigning a to the property. 例如，如果你的应用程序的目的是编辑文本文件，则可能会设置属性在应用程序上显示等待光标，而该文件加载或保存以防止任何鼠标事件正在处理。For example, if the purpose of your application is to edit a text file, you might set the property to to display a wait cursor over the application while the file loads or saves to prevent any mouse events from being processed. 完成该过程时，设置属性应用程序可以通过每个控件类型显示适当的光标。When the process is complete, set the property to for the application to display the appropriate cursor over each control type. > [!NOTE] > 如果调用之前重置属性改回游标，该应用程序将重新开始侦听鼠标事件，并且会继续显示相应为应用程序中的每个控件。If you call before resetting the property back to the cursor, the application will resume listening for mouse events and will resume displaying the appropriate for each control in the application. 可以从多个源，例如现有的句柄创建光标对象，一种标准文件、 资源或数据流。Cursor objects can be created from several sources, such as the handle of an existing , a standard file, a resource, or a data stream. > [!NOTE] > 类不支持动态的游标 （.ani 文件） 或使用黑色和白色以外的颜色的游标。The class does not support animated cursors (.ani files) or cursors with colors other than black and white. 如果你使用作为游标的映像太小，可以使用方法，以强制图像以填充游标的界限。If the image you are using as a cursor is too small, you can use the method to force the image to fill the bounds of the cursor. 你可以通过调用暂时隐藏光标方法，并将其还原通过调用方法。You can temporarily hide the cursor by calling the method, and restore it by calling the method. 从.NET Framework 4.5.2，开始将基于时 app.config 文件包含以下条目系统 DPI 设置调整大小：Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5.2, the will be resized based on the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示窗体，演示如何使用自定义光标。The following code example displays a form that demonstrates using a custom cursor. 自定义嵌入应用程序的资源文件中。The custom is embedded in the application's resource file. 该示例需要名为的光标文件中包含有一个光标`MyCursor.cur`。The example requires a cursor contained in a cursor file named `MyCursor.cur`. 若要编译此示例使用命令行，包括以下标志： `/res:MyCursor.Cur, CustomCursor.MyCursor.Cur`To compile this example using the command line, include the following flag: `/res:MyCursor.Cur, CustomCursor.MyCursor.Cur` [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor/CS/customcursor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor/VB/customcursor.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例显示中的客户信息控件。The following code example displays customer information in a control. 根树节点显示客户名称和子树节点显示分配给每个客户的订单编号。The root tree nodes display customer names, and the child tree nodes display the order numbers assigned to each customer. 在此示例中，有 15 个订单显示 1,000 客户。In this example, 1,000 customers are displayed with 15 orders each. 重新绘制的抑制的使用和方法和等待显示时创建并绘制对象。The repainting of the is suppressed by using the and methods, and a wait is displayed while the creates and paints the objects. 此示例要求你拥有一个名为的光标文件`MyWait.cur`应用程序目录中。This example requires that you have a cursor file named `MyWait.cur` in the application directory. 它还要求`Customer`可以容纳的集合的对象`Order`，你已创建的实例对象，并控制上。It also requires a `Customer` object that can hold a collection of `Order` objects, and that you have created an instance of a control on a . [!code-cpp[TreeView#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeView/CPP/treeview.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TreeView#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeView/CS/treeview.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TreeView#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeView/VB/treeview.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用它完成后，必须释放光标句柄。You must free the cursor handle when you are done with it. 有关释放资源的详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。For more information about disposing of resources, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建从游标光标的，更改其位置和剪辑矩形。The following code example creates a cursor from the cursor's , changes its position and clipping rectangle. 结果是光标将移动向上和向左 50 像素从其所在时执行的代码。The result is the cursor will move up and to the left 50 pixels from where it is when the code is executed. 此外，光标的剪辑矩形更改为窗体的边界 （默认情况下它位于用户的整个屏幕）。Additionally, the cursor's clipping rectangle is changed to the bounds of the form (by default it is the user's whole screen). 此示例要求你拥有和单击时其调用此代码。This example requires that you have a and a to call this code when it is clicked. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CPP/cursorstuff.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CS/cursorstuff.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/VB/cursorstuff.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的数据流`stream`必须包含光标 (.cur) 文件。The data stream specified by `stream` must contain a cursor (.cur) file. > [!NOTE] > 不支持动态的游标 （.ani 文件）类。Animated cursors (.ani files) are not supported by the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例加载从游标由方法。The following code example loads a cursor from a created by the method of an . 当调用该方法时，向用户显示和时间。When the method is called, an is displayed to the user and when a. 选择当前文件并关闭此对话框，该文件打开和返回用于创建。CUR file is selected and the dialog closed, the file is opened and the returned is used to create a . [!code-cpp[CursorFromResource#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CursorFromResource/CPP/mycursor.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CursorFromResource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CursorFromResource/CS/mycursor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CursorFromResource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CursorFromResource/VB/mycursor.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `fileName`参数必须引用标准光标 (.cur) 文件。The `fileName` parameter must reference a standard cursor (.cur) file. > [!NOTE] > 不支持动态的游标 （.ani 文件）类。Animated cursors (.ani files) are not supported by the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示中的客户信息控件。The following code example displays customer information in a control. 根树节点显示客户名称和子树节点显示分配给每个客户的订单编号。The root tree nodes display customer names, and the child tree nodes display the order numbers assigned to each customer. 在此示例中，有 15 个订单显示 1,000 客户。In this example, 1,000 customers are displayed with 15 orders each. 重新绘制的抑制的使用和方法和等待显示时创建并绘制对象。The repainting of the is suppressed by using the and methods, and a wait is displayed while the creates and paints the objects. 此示例要求你拥有`Customer`可以容纳的集合的对象`Order`对象。This example requires that you have a `Customer` object that can hold a collection of `Order` objects. 它还要求你创建的实例控制上。It also requires that you have created an instance of a control on a . [!code-cpp[TreeView#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeView/CPP/treeview.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TreeView#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeView/CS/treeview.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TreeView#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeView/VB/treeview.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下面是如何为你的应用程序中的资源嵌入游标的示例。The following is an example of how to embed a cursor as a resource within your application. 若要嵌入资源，引用资源名称后跟一个逗号，则其完整的程序集路径。To embed the resource, reference the resource name followed by a comma, then its full assembly path. 请参阅示例部分，若要了解如何从嵌入的资源加载光标。See the Example section to learn how to load the cursor from the embedded resource. ``` Using the C# compiler: csc /resource:"MyWaitCursor.cur","MyCursors.MyWaitCursor.cur" MyCursor.cs Using the Visual Basic compiler: vbc /resource:"MyWaitCursor.cur","MyCursors.MyWaitCursor.cur" MyCursor.vb ``` > [!NOTE] > 资源引用在编译时以及在代码中，引用它时是区分大小写，则 C# 和 Visual Basic 编译器。The resource reference when compiling as well as when referencing it in code, is case sensitive for both the C# and Visual Basic compilers. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示窗体，演示了如何通过使用自定义光标构造函数。The following code example displays a form that demonstrates using a custom cursor by using the constructor. 自定义嵌入应用程序的资源文件中。The custom is embedded in the application's resource file. 该示例需要有一个名为的光标文件中包含一个光标`MyCursor.cur`。The example requires that you have a cursor contained in a cursor file named `MyCursor.cur`. 若要编译此示例使用命令行，包括以下标志： `/res:MyCursor.Cur, CustomCursor.MyCursor.Cur`To compile this example using the command line, include the following flag: `/res:MyCursor.Cur, CustomCursor.MyCursor.Cur` [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor/CS/customcursor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor/VB/customcursor.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置表示光标的剪辑矩形的边界。

span.span: Gets or sets the bounds that represent the clipping rectangle for the cursor.

value.span: 代表 的剪辑矩形的 （采用屏幕坐标的形式）。

span.span: The that represents the clipping rectangle for the , in screen coordinates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 裁剪后的光标允许仅在其剪辑矩形内移动。A clipped cursor is allowed to move only within its clipping rectangle. 通常情况下，系统允许此仅当当前捕获了鼠标。Generally, the system allows this only if the mouse is currently captured. 如果当前未剪辑光标，生成的矩形包含整个屏幕的尺寸。If the cursor is not currently clipped, the resulting rectangle contains the dimensions of the entire screen. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建从游标光标的，更改其位置和剪辑矩形。The following code example creates a cursor from the cursor's , changes its position and clipping rectangle. 结果是光标将移动向上和向左 50 像素从其所在时执行的代码。The result is the cursor will move up and to the left 50 pixels from where it is when the code is executed. 此外，光标的剪辑矩形更改为窗体的边界 （默认情况下它位于用户的整个屏幕）。Additionally, the cursor's clipping rectangle is changed to the bounds of the form (by default it is the user's whole screen). 此示例要求你拥有和单击时其调用此代码。This example requires that you have a and a to call this code when it is clicked. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CPP/cursorstuff.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CS/cursorstuff.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/VB/cursorstuff.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于调用此方法创建的句柄必须释放的因为它将不会释放的垃圾回收器使用它完成后。The handle created as a result of calling this method must be disposed of when you are done with it because it will not be disposed of by the garbage collector.

summary.span: 获取或设置代表鼠标光标的光标对象。

span.span: Gets or sets a cursor object that represents the mouse cursor.
A that represents the mouse cursor.

value.span: 如果鼠标光标不可见，则默认为 。

span.span: The default is if the mouse cursor is not visible.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性更改当前显示的光标。Setting the property changes the cursor currently displayed. 应用程序可能或可能不能继续进行侦听的鼠标事件。The application may or may not continue to listen for mouse events. 若要发出信号，应用程序应不响应鼠标事件长时间运行操作期间，使用属性。To signal that the application should not respond to mouse events during a long-running operation, use the property. 在大多数情况下，但是，最好使用后台线程管理长时间运行的操作，并保留你的用户界面可供用户访问。In most cases, however, it's better to use a background thread to manage a long-running operation, and leave your user interface accessible to the user. 轻松地实现后台任务的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on easily implementing a background task, see .

permission.span: 用于将此属性设置安全子窗口。

span.span: for safe subwindows to set this property.

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法使 处于不可用状态。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，占用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，仅直到垃圾回收器释放它时，不会释放它所使用的资源。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector frees it. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在其正常大小，并在延伸模式下，其大小的两倍，窗体上绘制指定的游标。The following code example draws the specified cursor on the form in its normal size, and in stretched mode, twice its size. 此示例需要和地被调用时将传递给方法。This example requires a and a to pass into the method when it is called. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CPP/cursorstuff.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CS/cursorstuff.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/VB/cursorstuff.vb#2)]

The that represents the bounds of the .

summary.span: 在指定边界内、指定的表面上绘制光标。

span.span: Draws the cursor on the specified surface, within the specified bounds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该绘制命令上所表示的图形面产生`g`参数，但不包含有关如何呈现一个给定的映像，因此它将传递到调用信息。The drawing command originates on the graphics surface represented by the `g` parameter, but a does not contain information about how to render a given image, so it passes the call to the . 方法到给定的尺寸图像进行裁剪，并允许你指定要在其中绘制。The method crops the image to the given dimensions and allows you to specify a within which to draw the . 如果你想要在图形图面上绘制光标，通常使用此方法。This method is typically used if you want to draw the cursor on a Graphics surface. 例如，可能有一个对话框，允许用户选择从光标控件或一组控件。For example, you might have a dialog that allows the user to select cursors from a control, or a group of controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在其正常大小，并在延伸模式下，其大小的两倍，窗体上绘制指定的游标。The following code example draws the specified cursor on the form in its normal size, and in stretched mode, twice its size. 此示例要求你拥有和地被调用时将传递给方法的对象。This example requires that you have a and a object to pass into the method when it is called. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CPP/cursorstuff.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CS/cursorstuff.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/VB/cursorstuff.vb#2)]

summary.span: 在指定边界内、指定的表面上以拉伸格式绘制光标。

span.span: Draws the cursor in a stretched format on the specified surface, within the specified bounds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该绘制命令上所表示的图形面产生`g`参数，但对象不包含有关如何呈现一个给定的映像，因此它将传递到调用信息对象。The drawing command originates on the graphics surface represented by the `g` parameter, but a object does not contain information about how to render a given image, so it passes the call to the object. 方法拉伸图像以填充指定时绘制光标。The method stretches the image to fill the specified when the cursor is drawn. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在其正常大小，并在延伸模式下，其大小的两倍，窗体上绘制指定的游标。The following code example draws the specified cursor on the form in its normal size, and in stretched mode, twice its size. 此示例要求你拥有和地被调用时将传递给方法的对象。This example requires that you have a and a object to pass into the method when it is called. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CPP/cursorstuff.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CS/cursorstuff.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/VB/cursorstuff.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建从游标光标的，更改其位置和剪辑矩形。The following code example creates a cursor from the cursor's , changes its position and clipping rectangle. 结果是光标将移动向上和向左 50 像素从其所在时执行的代码。The result is the cursor will move up and to the left 50 pixels from where it is when the code is executed. 此外，光标的剪辑矩形更改为窗体的边界 （默认情况下它位于用户的整个屏幕）。Additionally, the cursor's clipping rectangle is changed to the bounds of the form (by default it is the user's whole screen). 此示例需要和单击时其调用此代码。This example requires a and a to call this code when it is clicked. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CPP/cursorstuff.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CS/cursorstuff.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/VB/cursorstuff.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取光标句柄。

span.span: Gets the handle of the cursor.
An that represents the cursor's handle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这不是一份句柄;不要释放它。This is not a copy of the handle; do not dispose of it. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建从游标光标的，更改其位置和剪辑矩形。The following code example creates a cursor from the cursor's , changes its position and clipping rectangle. 结果是光标将移动向上和向左 50 像素从其所在时执行的代码。The result is the cursor will move up and to the left 50 pixels from where it is when the code is executed. 此外，光标的剪辑矩形更改为窗体的边界 （默认情况下它位于用户的整个屏幕）。Additionally, the cursor's clipping rectangle is changed to the bounds of the form (by default it is the user's whole screen). 此示例需要和单击时其调用此代码。This example requires a and a to call this code when it is clicked. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CPP/cursorstuff.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CS/cursorstuff.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/VB/cursorstuff.vb#1)]

summary.span: 隐藏光标。

span.span: Hides the cursor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和必须平衡方法调用。The and method calls must be balanced. 每次调用方法必须相应地调用方法。For every call to the method there must be a corresponding call to the method. ## Examples 当鼠标指针进入按钮的工作区，下面的代码示例将隐藏光标。The following code example hides the cursor when the mouse pointer enters the button's client area. 同样，当鼠标指针离开按钮的工作区，光标将再次显示。Likewise, when the mouse pointer leaves the button's client area, the cursor is shown again. 此示例需要与名为`myButton`。This example requires a with a named `myButton`. [!code-cpp[CursorFromResource#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CursorFromResource/CPP/mycursor.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[CursorFromResource#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CursorFromResource/CS/mycursor.cs#3)] [!code-vb[CursorFromResource#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CursorFromResource/VB/mycursor.vb#3)]
